page.title: 07BLACKBIRD FESTIVAL
page.content: A few weeks ago it was Blackbird Leys Festival week. Festival week is when everybody enjoys themselves. There were lots of activities and many things to do. There were inflatables and Fun in the Parks for the children and for the adults there were beer tents, music and bands. At school there was a football match, the fourth year girls versus the P.T.A. ladies, and the fourth year girls won. I scored the only goal! There was a fair as well. I went to the fair nearly every day and I saw some of my friends there. I went on all the rides and I had candyfloss, toffee apples, chips and drinks. I think it is really good to see the old mix in with the young at the Festival.
